original_text: When the circumcising of the whole nation was finished, they remained in their places in the camp until they were healed.
korean_text: 또 그 모든 백성에게 할례 행하기를 마치매 백성이 진중 각 처소에 머물며 낫기를 기다릴 때에

sentences.original_text: When the circumcising of the whole nation was finished
they remained in their places in the camp
